alert.note: Alert for Walker (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued November 30 at 12:31AM CST until November 30 at 1:00AM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 100 AM CST FOR SOUTHEASTERN WALKER COUNTY... At 1231 AM CST, a confirmed tornado was located near Gorgas, or 10 miles southwest of Cordova, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Damaging tornado. SOURCE...Radar confirmed tornado. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. Locations impacted include... Dora, Quinton, Gorgas Steam Plant, Gorgas, Goodsprings, The Wye and Tutwiler. TORNADO...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: To repeat, a tornado is on the ground. TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
